column1: Uchi////The reason I'm saying that; we sat down around 7:30
column2: after we decided to go with the waiter's selections
column3: I felt the dishes were planned ahead of time because everything came quickly some even came 2 or 3 dishes at the same time so pretty much within an hour or so we had 16 courses but to order more it would take at least an hour
column5: we didn't wait an hour to get our "16" dishes and was at the peak time after 7:30! a restaurant like this has about 10 chefs behind the sushi bar working constantly
column6: it would take at least an hour to order a dish that I've never experienced or heard of it regardless how many sushi restaurants that I've been to
column7: no matter you have a full house or just have one customer if takes an hour to prepare a dish
